94079.「ここから 南東へ街道沿いに進むと\n モガリム街道っちゅう 街道に出ます。\n:
From here, you will reach Mogarim Highway, which is a road that goes southeast. If you continue along the
road, you will eventually reach the Town of Agrani, where Dwarfs live. If you have never been there, I recommend
you to go there at least once. It's quite an interesting place.

94080.「ごきげんよう 旅の人。\n わいは 行商人のワバンいいます。\n 以後 ごひい:
Cheery, I'm Waban, a peddler. My name is Waban, a peddler. I am Waban, a peddler. My job is to carry goods from
Mount Gatara in this wagon. I am going to the Town of Agrani now. If you like, I can give you a ride there.

94081.「これから アグラニの町へ行きますけど\n そっち方面に行く ご用ってありますか:
I'm on my way to the Town of Agrani.
If you want, I can give you a ride
there.<bw_break>

94082.「ごきげんよう 旅の人。\n わいは 行商人のワバンいいます。\n 以後 ごひい:
Cheery, I'm Waban, a peddler. My name is Waban, a peddler. I am Waban, a peddler. My job is to carry goods from
Mount Gatara in this wagon. I am going to Mogare Camp now. Do you have any business in that area? If you want, I
can give you a ride there.

94083.「これから モガレキャンプへ行きますけど\n そっち方面に行く ご用ってあります:
I'm on my way to Mogare Camp. Do you
have any business in that area? If you
want, I can give you a ride there.<bw_break>

94084.<pipipi_low>「……ありゃ！？ \n えらい すんまへんけど 今そこへ:
Oh, no!I'm very sorry, but it's not a good time to go there. I'll pay you back. Please give me some time before
you come back.

94085.「ただし 送るだけで 迎えはありまへん。\n それでも ええなら どこまで行かれ:
But I can only drop you off, not pick
you up. If that's all right, where
would you like to go?

Town of Agrani

94086.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「まいど おおき:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Thank you very much! Well, we'll be
leaving soon.

94087.「あらら。やめますか。\n ほなまた よろしゅう。:
Oops. I guess I'll stop now. Well,
I'll be glad to see you again.

94088.<pipipi_low>「おまっとさん。\n モガレキャンプに 着きましたで。\:
<pipipi_low>Hello, Mr. Omatto. We've arrived at
Mogare Camp. I look forward to seeing
you again.

94089.<pipipi_low>「おまっとさん。\n アグラニの町に 着きましたで。\n:
<pipipi_low>Hello, Mr. Omatto. We have arrived at
Town of Agrani. I hope to see you
again.

94090.「あちゃー。残念やけど お金が足りまへん。\n 悪いんやけど こっちも商売なんで:
Oops. I'm sorry, but we don't have enough money. I'm sorry, but we're in the business too. Please come again
when you have more money.

94091.「<%sL_TIMEI>まで\n 行かれるんやね。\n ２５ゴールド もらいます:
I see you are going to <%sL_TIMEI>.
I'll take 25 gold. Is that okay?<yesno><break>

94092.「さいですか。\n ほなまた よろしゅう。:
Is that right? I look forward to
seeing you again.

127384.<pipipi_low>「おまっとさん。\n オアシスの隊商宿に 着きましたで。:
<pipipi_low>Hi, Mr. Omatto. I've arrived at Oasis
Caravan. I hope to see you again.

47262.朽ち果てた 遺跡の祭壇がある。: There is an altar of decaying ruins.

47289.朽ち果てた 遺跡の祭壇がある。\n<br>\n<pc>は\nくぼみの間にスイッチ:
There is a rotting ruin altar.
<pc> found a switch between
the hollows!<yesno><close>

47290.なんと 柱の跡の機械から 雨雲がわきあがり\n辺りに 強い雨が 降りだした！:
Rain clouds were rising from the
machine at the remains of the pillars,
and the area began to rain hard!

144981.古い建物の 一部のようだ。\nカベが崩れて 辺りには 床石が\n無造作に 積み上:
It looks like part of an old building. The wall has
collapsed and the floor stones are piled haphazardly
all around.

144982.カベが崩れて 辺りには 床石が\n無造作に 積み上げられている。\nしかし 特に: The wall had collapsed and floor stones were piled haphazardly around the area. But nothing in particular was found.

144985.<pc>は 積み上げられた床石の下に\n神カラクリの残がいがあるのに 気がついた:
noticed under the pile of floor stones the remains of a divine machine.
obtained the Dolboard Remains (Key Item)!

144986.古い建物の 一部のようだ。\nカベが崩れて 辺りには 床石が\n無造作に 積み上:
It looks like part of an old building. The wall has
collapsed and the floor stones are piled haphazardly
all around.
